about.title: About us
about.text: The company Webex Technologies started its activity in 2007. Over time, we developed a special methodology for web development training, thanks to which our students acquired deep knowledge of web programming.We present three stages of teaching: Full Stack, Front end, Back end. Before choosing one of the stages, we talk to the students who are interested in us, knowing their purpose in the specialization of web programming, we recommend the professional stage of the preferred programming courses. Webex Technologies offers the students to choose online or stationary courses.
about.descr_online: The advantage of an online course is that you can learn web programming in any country in the world.
about.descr_stationary: The advantage of a stationary course is that you learn individually, under the direct supervision of a programmer.

main_goal.title: The purpose of our teaching is to train strong specialists
main_goal.text: To this end, students are given practical programming knowledge, individually, by web developers with 15 years of experience who will patiently explain all the nuances of programming and prove to you that there is nothing difficult in programming. We try to make our lessons accessible to everyone, so we have created an opportunity to learn online programming. This gives students the opportunity to learn the most complex programming algorithms anywhere and anytime. At the end of the course, students will receive a certificate verifying that the student is a qualified web developer. In this video are presented our student's comments about the courses of WebEx Technologies.

mothods.title: A little from our educational methodology

procedures.title: Procedure
procedures.0: First, an interview is conducted, as a result of which we find out the initial knowledge of the student. Based on the results of this interview, it is decided whether he has to start from the beginning or from the middle of the curriculum.
procedures.1: Classes are held on an individual basis, it means that we are training with each student individually in the classroom or online. There can be up to 10 students (it’s also possible only you may be in the classroom or online if the teacher-programmer decides that there is a need to explain to you certain topics in detail).
procedures.2: A video lesson is given to each student, after which the teacher answers your questions, and if there are no questions, we pass to the task, which is given during the lesson, if necessary.
procedures.3: At the end of the lesson, a homework is given on this topic. In the next lesson, the task is checked by the teacher, if there are failed parts, it is discussed by the teacher.
procedures.4: If the student has difficulties while performing the task, the teacher will never move forward ․ This topic is explained again and the student gets a new task. This method prolongs the number of student classes, but we get a guaranteed quality, and those who graduate from us at the end becоme stable specialists.
procedures.5: At the end of the courses, the student receives a certificate that he/she is a qualified specialist.
procedures.6: After completing the courses, we also guarantee that specialist to our partner organizations or we offer to the bests of them internship in our company and also offer a job with us if they manifest themselves well.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a_00: The duration of the courses directly depends on the student's ability to perceive quickly. The sooner the student understands the topics, the sooner the courses will end, because we do not move forward until we understand that the student has finally understood the topic. It should be noted, however, that the main course (
faq.a_01: ) has so far lasted at least 7 months and at most 15 months.
faq.q_1: How much does the course cost?
faq.a_1: The cost of an individual training course both online and stationary is 50,000 AMD. We do not provide group training at WebEx, as its efficiency is incomparably small. The lessons last 1.5 hours, three times a week. The price includes 12 lessons per month.
faq.q_2: What time can you participate in the lesson?
faq.a_2: Since the lessons are individual, you can participate in the lessons at the time convenient for you, of course, agreeing in advance with the teacher.
faq.a_3: Note that there is no one who knows all the programming knowledge, our main role is to separate the main topics from the secondary ones.

dev.intro: WebEx Technologies is not only a company that provides training services, but also a company that implements serious programming projects. Based on the experience of our specialists for more than 15 years, we provide only the most basic and most important knowledge, and questions that are most often asked during interviews are also taken into account:

advantages.short_text: Webex Technologies courses have a number of advantages that make the lessons more effective and accessible to students.

0.title: Professional teaching
0.text: Our lessons are conducted according to the developed program and are constantly updated, including innovations and new solutions. We conduct the course through video lessons, showing an individual approach.

1.title: High quality specialists
1.text: Our specialists have up to 15 years of experience and they are web developers. They will patiently explain the nuances of programming and prove to you that there is nothing difficult in programming.

2.title: Individual approach
2.text: Our advantage is that we provide an individual approach to the student. Taking into account the student's abilities, we develop an individualized curriculum to make teaching more accessible.

3.title: Video lessons
3.text: We try to make our lessons accessible to everyone, so we have created an opportunity to learn online programming. In this way, students have the opportunity to study anywhere, anytime.

4.title: Certificate
4.text: At the end of the courses, a certificate is issued verifying that you are a qualified professional, but it should be remembered that knowledge is important in the field of information technology.

5.title: Job placement
5.text: Webex supports students to find employment in our company or in partner organizations. In each case, it all depends on you, as the students must be interviewed before being hired
